{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aerohive |model=HiveAP 141 |revision=(AH-AP-141) |asin=B01LFKLT1C |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=EoL (08/01/2022) |fcc_date=06/08/2012 |fcc_id=WBV-HIVEAP1X1 |ic_id=7774A-HIVEAP1X1 |pcb_id=2976400302 |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344;AR9344-BC2A; |cpu1_cspeed=560 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L8006EM2I-12G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP1 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (9600 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344;AR9344-BC2A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9382;AR9382-AL1A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=RS-232 Driver Receiver;Sipex;SP3220;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3204T;;1;,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;;2;,,, 4 Pin General Purpose Photocoupler;Sharp;PC817;;2;,,, 80V PoE PD Controller;National Semiconductor;LM5071;;1;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier w/Power Detector;Skyworks;SE5005L;;2;,,, 50V Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Panjit Semiconductor;SD1050S;;1;,,, 0.5A Glass Passivated Bridge Rectifier;WTE Power Semiconductors;B6S;;2;,,, 1Kb I2C/SMBus EEPROM w/SHA-1 Engine;Maxim Integrated;DS28CN01U;;1;,,, 2A 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 2A 4.2V-16V Fast Transient Synchronous Step-down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP1492;;1;,,, 3A 18V 340KHz Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP1484EN;;1; |flags=PoE in, TPM |stock_boot=Aerohive Boot Loader;1.0.0.50; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=aerohive |oui=40:18:B1 |oui_eth=40:18:B1 }} {{TagLine|802.11n Dual Radio Access Point}} :[http://www.aerohiveworks.com/Aerohive-AP141.asp Product page]
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/WBV-HIVEAP1X1 WBV-HIVEAP1X1] (06/08/2012) â€¢ [[Aerohive HiveAP 141]] (ext. antennas). :FCC ID also applies to the [[Aerohive HiveAP 121]] (4dBi PCB dipole int. antennas). :The device may use [[Atheros]] AR9344 + AR9382.
"2976400301" is silkscreened on the board.
*{{WiFiCert|WFA15612|06/26/2013}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9344-BC2A [[MIPS 74Kc]] @560MHz (WiSoC) *Flash (NAND): ''Hynix'' H27U1G8F2BTR (128MB) *Flash (SPI): ''Macronix'' MX25L8006E (1MB) *RAM: 2x ''Nanya'' NT5TU32M16DG (128MB) DDR2 *WiFi 2.4GHz: [[Atheros]] AR9344 (WiSoC) *WiFi 5.0GHz: [[Atheros]] AR9382 *Ethernet: [[Atheros]] AR8035-A *TPM: [[Atmel]] SC3204 *USB: 1x USB 2.0
==Images== <gallery> File:Aerohive HiveAP 141 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Aerohive HiveAP 141 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
